short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets a custom homepage for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your browser home page with a page with images from Korean dramas with a timer, bookmarks, a list of tasks, a choice of search engine for searching (google, bing, naver, duckduckgo) and much more.
The application supports English, French, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, and Ukrainian.
